entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Method for creating a List #102100
  • X509Certificate2 Handling of RSASSA-PSS certificates #102090
    Future
  • JIT is missing a common case to track the IsNeverNegative assertion #102088
    9.0.0
  • System.Numerics.Tests.op_rightshiftTest.LargeNegativeBigIntegerShiftTest #102087
  • Test cases for validation of the `SwiftIndirectResult` proposal #102082
    9.0.0
  • [hot reload] Validate / Implement support for adding `static extern` methods #102080
  • Test cases for validation of the `SwiftSelf<T>` proposal #102079
    9.0.0
  • [System.Text.Json] Expose additional metadata in contract APIs. #102078
    9.0.0
  • Implement support for Swift frozen structs in Mono runtime #102077
    9.0.0
  • JIT: IV widening does not kick in for a simple loop with array and string indexing #102068
    9.0.0

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Add new string to ToList #102099
  • Mono: F# compiler crashes while compiling hello world app with "wrong maximal instruction length" #102086
    9.0.0
  • AVX512 codegen issues #100404
    8.0.x
  • Unifying Integer types #102049
  • Optimize `VectorXX` equality checks in JIT #88490
    Future
  • [NativeAOT] Static lib linking looking for dynamic lib in linux #102020
  • [8.0] [Installer] Failure in command: rpm2cpio netstandard-targeting-pack-2.1.0-x64.rpm | cpio -idmv #101788
  • The System.Text.Json source generator doesn't populate `JsonPropertyInfo.AttributeProvider` metadata. #100095
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Introduce alternative name of constructors -> ctor #102070
  • Some networking tests failing in Outerloop on Windows 7 #31382
    Future
  • Moving to dotnet 8 causes a memory leak #101907
  • [Default Interfaces] Support constrained interface calls on value types #9490
  • Provide a `hostfxr` API for resolving runtime frameworks #99027
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Chained comparison of two integers against a constant is not coalesced #102103
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix Mono.Linker.Tests build #102102
    needs-area-label
  • Spanify some ``Utf8String`` and ``Utf8StringBuilder`` use #102101
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Change the ReciprocalEstimate and ReciprocalSqrtEstimate APIs to be mustExpand on RyuJIT #102098
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Backport "Merge CoreCLR-based official builds legs into one leg per platform" #102097
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0-staging] Allow setting ZipArchiveEntry general-purpose flag bits #102096
    area-System.IO.Compression, 6.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Removed unused sessions from SSL_CTX internal cache #102095
    area-System.Net.Security
  • TypeDescriptor-related trimming supportType descriptor #102094
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation
  • TimeSpanConverter: Less restrict in-range check to allow more timespan formats that would be accepted by Utf8Parser.TryParse #102091
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Use BoundsCheckNoThrow assertion in optAssertionProp_RangeProperties #102089
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix msquic on latest (2.3.5) release #102085
    area-System.Net.Http
  • ARM64: avoid memory barrier in InlinedMemmoveGCRefsHelper if dest is not on heap #102084
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] [WinHttpHandler] Move `_cachedSendPinnedBuffer` ownership to `WinHttpRequestState` #102083
    area-System.Net
  • Enable repackaging of NETStandard 2.1 Targeting Pack #102081
    Servicing-approved, area-Setup
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Sve.CreateFalseMask*() #102076
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [RISC-V] Fix invalid operand register in the emitted addition/subtraction code #102074
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix VirtualCallStubManager stats capturing on EE shutdown #102073
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Remove `linux-arm` as a supported RID in .NET8 #102072
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • Refactor handling of two immediates in hwintrinsic #102071
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [wasm] Use the cbl-mariner-2.0-cross-amd64 image #102069
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Disable tests failing on NAOT #102065
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Custom mmap follow-up PR #102064
    area-VM-meta-mono

Merged

  • [mini] arm64: Add some more space for tailcall opcodes #102092
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Simplify BigInteger.Multiply #98587
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fix for profiler test arm64 #102066
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Transition to 1ES templates work (Backport crossgen2 changes) #101869
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • make Socket useable after cancellation #99181
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0-preview4] disable new EH on win-arm64 #102060
    Servicing-approved, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Compile AOT compilers with InvariantGlobalization #102067
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Support SV48 Virtual Memory Layout #101966
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add flag for NAOT linking, but not enabling server GC #102062
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove snapcraft files #101768
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Provide System.IO.Pipelines package readme #99666
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution
  • Add `hostfxr_resolve_frameworks_for_runtime_config` for resolving runtime frameworks #101451
    area-Host, 9.0.0
  • [mono] miscellaneous AOT optimizations #102039
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Porting `SuspendAllThreads` from the NativeAOT to CoreCLR. #101782
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add custom mmap/munmap implementation for anonymous mappings #101871
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Switch AOT compilers to use AssemblyNameInfo #102036
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • [Experiment] Change temporary entrypoints to be lazily allocated #101580
    area-VM-coreclr
  • AVX10.1 API introduction in JIT #101938
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Switch DirectoryControl to use AsnWriter, AsnDecoder #101512
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • [cdac] Read types from contract descriptor #101994
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Unpin arm build image, use Debian 12 helix images #102059
    needs-area-label
  • Code Versioning - move native code versioning state #101652
    area-VM-coreclr, Future
  • Arm64/Sve: Implement SVE Math *Multiply* APIs #102007
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arm-sve
  • JIT: Expand optRelopImpliesRelop for constants as op1 #102024
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Console.Unix: revert SetWindowSize implementation. #100272
    area-System.Console, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Tensor wave 1 API's. #101196
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono] generic wrapper methods for unsafe accessors #101732
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • ILLink: Add EdgeVisitor and ITracingNode to enable logging dependency graph edges to illink dependency loggers #101949
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Handle more than 64 registers - Part 1 #101950
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] `clang -fuse-ld=lld` output is low priority #102000
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add option to change SVE vector length for current and children processes #101295
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [wasm] Where possible, use ReadableStream.pipeTo to load files into the heap #101982
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] Allow setting ZipArchiveEntry general-purpose flag bits #102063
    area-System.IO.Compression, 8.0.x
  • Backport #92296 and #92438 to release/6.0-staging #101822
    area-Infrastructure
  • Use ``BitOperations`` in couple more places #101701
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • JIT: Visit switch successors in increasing likelihood order for RPO-based layout #101935
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add dynamic allocation sampling following a Poisson process instead of using a static threshold #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add PipeWriter overloads to Json #101461
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [TEST] noop change to see if tests are passing #85694
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Utilize new APIs in the WebSocket implementation #101953
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Add quirks for riscv to R2RDump #101683
    area-R2RDump-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fold identical method bodies in the compiler #101969
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V][x64] WiP: Passing empty struct fields #101796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Target NetCoreAppToolCurrent in ILC test projects #102058
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Add missing GC wbarriers for static field stores with hotreload enabled #100775
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [wasm] Integrate naot-llvm into workload manifest #101801
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • Add .NET Libraries fuzzing targets and automation #101993
    area-Meta, 9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Generate C# bindings for Foundation framework #2584
  • Generate C# bindings for CryptoKit framework #2583

PullRequests

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Build on Linux #2574
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RegFree COM for .Net core(net6.0) is looking for wrong dll versions of dependent libraries #40819
  • `dotnet tool install --global` reinstalls even if the same version is already present #40818
  • Create a `solution` alias for the existing `sln` command #40817
  • dotnet cli and Visual Studio restore SDK-style netfx 2.0 projects differently #40816
  • AutoGenerateBindingRedirects excludes transient dependencies #40803
  • Wired path added in path env #40801

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #40824
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add test for IlcLinkServerGC #40823
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Do not go beyond the root when searching for a previously installed tool Fixes #40655 #40800
    untriaged, Area-Tools

Merged

  • Remove the 7.0 template packages #40710
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Stop Running SDK Diff Test Pipeline on Branches Affected by Installer -> SDK merge #40779
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix ignored paths used by binary tool #40777
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [WebAssembly] Remove temporary workarounds #40809
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-WasmSdk
  • Delete src/SourceBuild/patches/winforms/0001-Disable-IL2055-for-a-new… #40815
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Aspire #40111
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Reference latest MSBuild for netcore MSBuild stuff #40603
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2449218 #40693
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Publish PRs for Source-Build Test Results #40753
    source-build, Area-VMR
  • Bug dotnet/sdk-container-builds#559: PublishContainer Appends "dotnet <Target>.dll" to ENTRYPOINT for Self Contained Builds #40792
    untriaged, Area-Containers

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-10
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Use inline differences for specification updates in semi-auto-properties.md #8113
  • Clarify Roslyn breaking change for "unsafe in iterators" #8111

Merged

  • Add ref-in-async to schedule queue #8110

Updated

  • Add detailed design to clarify the field keyword spec and incorporate all LDM decisions #8069
  • Adjust extension member lookup to prefer more specific members #8012

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Raw string guide line isn't shown in "Peek definition" window #73431
    Backlog
  • C# snippets don't work if LSP Roslyn editor is enabled #73428
  • Hot Reload: Allow extern functions to be added #73421
  • "Implement interface" IDE options disappear when the class has a static member with the same name #73420

Closed

  • Completion Service does not provide all methods available. #73427
  • Error CS0121 with overloads of params and generic parameters #73422
  • False positive 'possible null reference argument' after ensuring non-null via the null coalescing operator #73426
  • [BUG] "Move Type To .." feature not generating new .cs file #73273

PullRequests

Created

  • Do less work computing diff-merge results in the common case. #73430
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Recognize 'allows ref struct' constraint in VB compiler #73429
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Avoid LOH allocation in text synchronization #73425
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce LOH allocs when applying code fixes. #73424
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Net9 Reference Assemblies #73423
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Revert "Move AsyncBatchingWorkQueue usage in telemetry to TelemetryLogging level" #73432
    Next
  • Remove IsCompatBreakingFeatureEnabled method #73371
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Fix features with extension-types #73418
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Continue visiting bad named argument if not target-typed in NullableWalker #73326
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged, Next
  • Fix issues with JTF blocking in codemodel #73419
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Improve fix-all progress bar experience #73412
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Update msbuild version to 17.3.4 #73283
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Switch Roslyn protocol types to System.Text.Json serialization #73207
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Emit and roundtrip underlying instance field #73407
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Workaround vsix deployment issue in local build #69266
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update local deployment instructions #73417
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Use semantics to check for readonly struct #72893
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Test local functions with goto out of scope #73402
    Area-Compilers, Test-Gap, untriaged
  • Clean up Razor EA #73040
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ignore drive casing when comparing on windows platforms #73380
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove nonreentrantlock type #72087
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Partial properties: basic indexer scenarios and signature mismatch diagnostics #73378
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Need help with SSE and .NET events #55663
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, plaintext #55661
  • Blazor SSR stream rendering not working when i deploy to nginx server on linux #55660
  • Project created by dotnet new blazor -int WebAssembly -ai cannot be deployed to a static web site #55658
  • Add Description to ProducesResponseType (and others) for better OpenAPI documents #55656
  • Buffering issues when returning an SSE response #55654
  • Quarantine Locking_ExecuteAllRequestsWhenDisabled #55652

Closed

  • Benchmark stopped running: QueryCompilation #55636
  • Perf improvement: plaintext, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter, plainTextSansFilter #55588
  • Perf regression: https #55651
  • Quarantine CanRenderComponentWithPersistedState(suppressEnhancedNavigation: False, renderMode: typeof(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web.InteractiveAutoRenderMode), streaming: "AutoStreaming"/null) #50810
    9.0-preview5
  • Omit body parameter validation when binding fails #53058
  • Blazor server azure b2c redirect issue #55631
  • Perf improvement: plainTextEmptyFilter #55569
  • Perf improvement: mapaction, mvc, plaintext #55587
  • Perf improvement: json #55609
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries #55610
  • Attribute name="" from Input* when included, the data from form cannot be submitted. #55627
  • Invalid auto-generated code when publishing with PublishTrimmed=true #53326
  • VS 2022 Preview should recognize changes to *.js files in Blazor component library #55429

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix shadow copy up to date check on startup (#52831) #55659
    Servicing-consider, area-networking, 8.0.x
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `d83fee1` to `fa6de7f` #55655
    area-infrastructure
  • Quarantine Locking_ExecuteAllRequestsWhenDisabled #55653
    area-middleware

Merged

  • Fix flaky CanRenderComponentWithPersistedState test variations #55603
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview5
  • Quarantine CanResetSharedKey #54841
    area-identity, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview5
  • Use built-in OpenAPI support in templates #55343
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 9.0-preview5
  • [release/6.0] Update spa-templates submodule #55649
    tell-mode, 6.0.31

Updated

  • [Blazor] Adds compresion support for all assets in an application #55558
    area-blazor
  • Support key deletion in Data Protection #53860
    area-dataprotection, pending-ci-rerun
  • Relocate webtransport streams initialisation from HTTP3 connection accept loop to streams type #55425
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • [Blazor] Add an API to describe the render mode (if any) a component is running in #55577
    area-blazor
  • UnixCertificateManager: implement IsTrusted. #55335
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add logging to MVC tests #55592
    area-mvc
  • Include a warning about port spoofing in xml #54971
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Improve Kestrel connection metrics with error reasons #55565
    area-networking
  • Add AnyHeader and AnyMethod #55650
    area-mvc, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Android https app links (deep links) don't work if app isn't already running #22336
  • iOS: Entry in Shell Flyout Footer gets covered by Keyboard when tapped #22332
  • App did not automatically reflect changes to the label #22331
  • [IOS] Maui .NET 8 (VS 2022 17.9.6) The app has been terminated when start debugging #22330
  • StrokeDashArray of a Border control is not well recycled with a CollectionView #22326
    Backlog
  • [MAUI]Clicking on 'Dessert' shows nothing. #22325
  • Flyout labels are invisible after clearing custom FlyoutContent #22324
    Backlog

Closed

  • [Android] CarouselView: VirtualView cannot be null here, when clearing and adding items on second navigation #22035
    .NET 8 SR5

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump to 8.0.60 #22339
  • Flakey test fixes #22338
  • Update dependabot.yml to fix slash vs. dash #22337
    area-infrastructure
  • Install bits for UITest to run #22333
  • [Trimming] Add ILC compilation test of all assemblies #22328

Merged

  • [Android] CarouselView: VirtualView cannot be null here, when clearing and adding items on second navigation - fix #22207
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Update dependabot.yml labels for upstream/infrastructure #22335
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • [iOS] Span's TapGestureRecognizer not working if text is truncated #22213
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-gestures
  • Previously selected item cannot be reselected fix #21490
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [iOS] Button CharacterSpacing Fix #20537
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • Relative source binding for gradient stop fix #20287
    area-drawing, community ✨
  • Allow for disabling default MAUI usings when embedding #19314
    area-single-project, t/native-embedding, stale
  • Core remapping alternate take #18635
    stale
  • Make ImageSource more async-friendly #22098
    community ✨, area-controls-image
  • [Android] Action mode menu doesn't disappear when switch on another tab - fix #21231
    community ✨
  • Wrap Image with a container on Windows so that it is centered with AspectFill #17665
    platform/windows 🪟, do-not-merge, area-controls-image
  • Fix: Binding doesn't respect special IValueConverter return values #12060
    area-xaml, community ✨, stale, t/perf, Under Consideration
  • Fixes BindableLayout BindingContext inheritance #17290
    area-perf, community ✨, memory-leak 💦, t/perf
  • [ios] update `MemoryAnalyzers` package, add to Controls #18318
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-perf, stale, memory-leak 💦, t/perf
  • use raw string literals #19961
    area-perf, community ✨, t/perf
  • use MathF where possible #19965
    area-perf, community ✨, t/perf
  • Optimize Thickness and CornerRadius converters #20033
    area-perf, community ✨, t/perf
  • Batch CollectionChanged events #20036
    area-perf, community ✨, t/perf
  • Improve Clamp() performance #20051
    area-perf, community ✨, t/perf
  • Reduce the number of calls to invalidate measure #21801
    area-layout, t/perf
  • [WinUI] Perf when creating non-trivial grids (and other visual controls) #21818
    platform/windows 🪟, area-perf, community ✨, t/perf
  • [WinUI] Cache gesture event subscriptions #21959
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-gestures, t/perf, .NET 8 SR6
  • Optimize ordering of children in Flex layout #21961
    area-layout, community ✨, layout-flex, t/perf
  • [WinUI] Perf when creating non-trivial grids (and other visual controls) (take 2) #22108
    platform/windows 🪟, area-perf, community ✨, t/perf
  • [android] fix one layer of "overdraw" by default #22126
    platform/android 🤖, area-perf, t/perf
  • [Android] Ecosystem updates WAS:Google Maps bump/update #20783
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-map
  • Improvement- alternative geodesic/geolocation distance calculation algorithms #20663
    area-essentials, area-controls-map
  • [Android] Allow full screen videos from WebView #15472
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area-controls-webview, Under Consideration
  • [iOS] Fix WordWrap not working when Padding is set on Label #16136
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-label, Under Consideration
  • Reduce Confusion of DateSelected Event in DatePicker (Split Into DateSelected and DateChanged) #16153
    community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix default Switch Style #16252
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area-templates, area-controls-switch, Under Consideration
  • Fix legacy logical children to correctly add/remove #17410
    t/bug, area-controls-swipeview, stale, .NET 9 Planning
  • Fix Action Sheets for macOS #19629
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-controls-dialogalert, stale
  • Added ProcessTerminated event to WebView #20059
    t/enhancement ☀️, area-controls-webview
  • PullToRefresh & item selection when listView is not enabled [iOS] #20102
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-listview
  • [iOS] Fixed picker title's color #20205
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • [iOS] Fixed auto picker resizing after selection #20207
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • Fixed Switch Thumb and On Colors #20346
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-switch
  • [iOS] Fixed RadioButton text related properties not working #20366
    community ✨, area-controls-radiobutton
  • [iOS] Html label not applying bold or italics #20488
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • [iOS] Frames' content update #20501
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-frame
  • [iOS] Readonly Editor - Scrolling fix #20505
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • [Testing] Added UITest to validate the Switch OnColor property #20542
    area-testing, area-controls-switch, testing-flakiness
  • [Android] DatePicker Focus and Unfocus events #20547
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker
  • added Command and CommandParameter on CheckBox #20717
    community ✨, area-controls-checkbox
  • [iOS] PullToRefresh activity indicator hidden behind header in CollectionView - fix #20824
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-refreshview
  • [iOS] Use updated APIs for the button with images #20953
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-button
  • [Android] Fixed border inside frame not rendering #20974
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-border
  • [Span] Improve formatting inheritance #21191
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-label
  • [Android] Border with RoundRectangle - fix #21250
    community ✨, area-controls-border
  • [iOS] Disabled Editors Show Keyboard Partially When Tapped - Fix #21347
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • [iOS] Apply contentInsets for any entry/editor in a scrollview #21807

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SqlExpression for function with atypical format #33697
  • efcore 8.0.4 version. attach method 10 times slower than version 7.* #33696

Closed

  • Cannot use ServiceProvider to create DbContextFactory, but can use it to create DbContext #33698
  • Mapping unsupported uint in a new db provider ( #33695

PullRequests

Created

  • Refactor compiled models MSBuild integration. #33700
